comment_body:
Love sci-fi horror and this piqued my interest. I wish it were longer story so I could understand how the AI came to such a decision. Did it become sentient along the way? Did it understand poetic Justice? 

Good read

Initially I had that the "youngers" had decided (opposite the elders).  My motivation is that they are just tired of the elders making poor decisions. Kind of a play on the "okay boomer" mentality.  But with out having introduced the youngers I wasn't sure if the connection was going to be made.
